trigger_prototype.name: EC2: No datapoints for {#NAME}
trigger_prototype.description: 1. Your item is incorrectly configured (dimension, namespace, metric name could be wrong) 2. Instance was terminated and this item will disappear after next discovery

dependency.name: EC2: {#NAME}: High CPU usage for last 60 min
